profile:
☆☆☆LICENSED AND REGISTERED HEATING AND AIR CONDITIONING COMPANY☆☆☆
BOSS Mechanical Inc. is a licensed and registered heating and air conditioning company.  We serve the Brampton, GTA, Mississauga, Halton Region, Markham, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Hamilton, Oakville, Burlington, Ancaster and all surrounding areas to provide the highest quality in HVAC services and installation.  If you are looking for expert contractors, fast service and quality products call us today!

☆☆☆HIGH QUALITY SERVICES☆☆☆
BOSS Mechanical Inc. is a consumer driven company who pride ourselves on providing high quality HVAC solutions, cleanliness, professional services and affordable rates to help give our customers peace of mind.

☆☆☆QUALIFIED TECHNICIANS☆☆☆
All our technicians are licensed, knowledgeable, skilled installers with experienced workmanship.  We are committed to providing total customer satisfaction, whatever the weather may be.  Your satisfaction is our goal!

profile:
Five Lions Heating & Cooling is a Toronto based company. We are independently owned and operated. At Five Lions Heating & Cooling we specialize in air quality solutions in your home. Whether residential or commercial we provide services in installations, repairs and maintenance.
We extend our HVAC services throughout the GTA and even further! Five Lions Heating & Cooling is available 7 days a week, 24 hours a day. We’re dedicated and committed in completing all our job duties. We find solutions and the right fit for better air quality. Our priority is in making our customers happy and comfortable in any space.


When you choose Five Lions Heating & Cooling, we strive to make you feel confident that you’re getting the highest quality in both products and service. We’re committed to delivering complete customer satisfaction in everything we do.


Five Lions Heating & Cooling is fully licensed and operates under the Technical Standards & Safety Authority (TSSA). We also carry 2 million liability insurance. Protecting our customers to ensure safety is very important us. Our professional HVAC team is highly qualified and experienced in installations and repairs. Five Lions Heating & Cooling, is a company that you can count on to service all your residential and commercial needs.

profile:
Royalty Air Systems has been providing heating, air conditioning, and air quality systems and installation services in the Greater Toronto area for 20 years.

With 20 years of experience providing the absolute best in Air Conditioning and Heating Service, we maintain a tradition of quality, value and excellent customer service.

Regardless of how small or large the project, our customers can rest assured that they will receive attentive, personalized service – something you just don’t get from companies owned by corporate conglomerates.

Since opening shop in 2000, the secret to our success and longevity has been to keep serving our customers faster, better and always at a fair price.
